text: Hans Haas (15 January 1945 â€“ 12 September 2021) was a Dutch politician. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Appeal. He was the mayor of Maasdriel from 1989 to 1995), the mayor of Haaren from 1996 to 16 February 2001 and the mayor of Valkenswaard from 16 February 2001 to 1 February 2007. He retired on 1 February 2007. He ended his retirement in 2008 and became mayor of Boekel and acting mayor of Gemert-Bakel from 2010 to 2011. Haas died in Druten on 12 September 2021. == References == Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Christian Democratic Appeal politicians Category:Dutch mayors
title: Hans Haas
